title: New: Avalon Emerson – Caroline
body: It’s been a whole since San Francisco based producer **Avalon Emerson** has graced the pages of CitR, [back then she was writing songs](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/9816-introducing-avalon-s/ "Introducing: Avalon"), right now she’s making house music, which is arguably better than her original output. This new disco heavy cut is a dramatic and sensual little treat, soulful samples, clashes, stomps, the kitchen sink; you name it. Shit like this is made for the dance-floor, and I’m sat in my smoke filled bedroom. Shame.
